titleStmt.title: The oath to bee taken by all members of the Parliament 1641. and in all Parliaments hereafter, before they proceed to any act or determination.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: "Read in audience of Parliament who approveth the same, and appointeth the same to bee taken by all members of Parliament ..."
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
